Text:
Lexi Love (born December 23, 1980) is an American pornographic actress of Sicilian an German descent. She started acting in erotic films on September 08th of 2004 at the age of 23. Before Love started acting in erotic films she worked as Minnie, Mickey, an Pooh Bear for Walt Disney world in Orlando FL and studied Chemical Engineering in Western Massachusetts an San Francisco.

Loves owns an operates pornographic entertainment company Lexi Love Entertainment an is Trade Marked by the united states government.

Love has acted in over 350 adult DVD titles and on numerous websites.
